title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4004 - Transmission Of Information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4004 - Transmission Of Information

State Regulations
§ 4004.1 - Information transmission regulated
§ 4004.2 - Repealed
§ 4004.3 - Transmission equipment to be reported
§ 4004.4 - Telephones restricted
§ 4004.5 - Radio, video contracts to be filed
§ 4004.6 - Transmission of racing information
§ 4004.7 - Combination of New York wagers with wagers made in other states or foreign countries

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4004

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 906; L. 1982, ch. 865, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
